amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funds to kill, or assist others in killing, any Bison in the Yellowstone National Park herd.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restrict the use of funds from being used to kill, or assist others in killing, any Bison in the Yellowstone National Park herd.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 220 (Roll no. 383).
